local_intent: Ensure T-block is visible, re-align to it, push +X by 0.1 m, briefly wait, and verify continued visibility.
assumptions: t_block can be re-detected if lost
push direction 0 deg moves toward goal outline
coherence_with_global: Implements one push cycle inside the Repeat: perceive t_block, approach/align, push, stabilize wait, and post-check before next cycle.
